entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow after midnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight then light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
